定.definition: to fix; to set; to make definite; to subscribe to (a newspaper etc); to book (tickets etc); to order (goods etc); to congeal; to coagulate; (literary) definitely

定下.definition: to set (the tone, a target etc); to lay down (the beat)

定位.definition: to orientate; to position; to categorize (as); to characterize (as); positioning; position; niche

定位球.definition: (football) set piece (a restart of play following a stoppage, including free kicks, corner kicks, penalty kicks, goal kicks and throw-ins)

定作.definition: to have sth made to order

定做.definition: to have something made to order

定價.definition: to set a price; to fix a price

定出.definition: to determine; to fix upon; to set (a target, a price etc)

定分.definition: predestination; one's lot (of good and bad fortune)

定南.definition: Dingnan county in Ganzhou 贛州|赣州[Gan4 zhou1], Jiangxi

定南縣.definition: Dingnan county in Ganzhou 贛州|赣州[Gan4 zhou1], Jiangxi

定單.definition: variant of 訂單|订单[ding4 dan1]

定型.definition: to finalize (a design etc); stereotype; permanent wave or perm (hairdressing)

定奪.definition: to make a decision; to determine

定婚.definition: variant of 訂婚|订婚[ding4 hun1]

定存.definition: certificate of deposit; time deposit; abbr. for 定期存款|定期存款[ding4 qi1 cun2 kuan3]

定局.definition: foregone conclusion; to be settled conclusively

定居.definition: to settle (in some city, country etc); to take up residence

定州市.definition: Dingzhou, county-level city directly administered by Hebei Province

定式.definition: joseki (fixed opening pattern in go game)

定弦.definition: tuning (stringed instrument); (fig.) to make up one's mind

定律.definition: scientific law (e.g. law of conservation of energy); (in human affairs) a generalization based on observation (e.g. "power corrupts")

定心丸.definition: tranquilizer; sth that sets one's mind at ease

定性.definition: to determine the nature (of sth); to determine the chemical composition (of a substance); qualitative

定情.definition: to exchange love tokens or vows; to pledge one's love; to get engaged

定戶.definition: variant of 訂戶|订户[ding4 hu4]

定數.definition: constant (math.); quota; fixed number (e.g. of places on a bus); fixed quantity (e.g. load of truck); destiny

定於一尊.definition: (idiom) to rely on a single authority to determine what is correct; to regard a source (or entity or individual) as the ultimate authority

定日.definition: Tingri town and county, Tibetan: Ding ri rdzong, in Shigatse prefecture, central Tibet

定日縣.definition: Tingri county, Tibetan: Ding ri rdzong, in Shigatse prefecture, Tibet

定時.definition: to fix a time; fixed time; timed (of explosive etc)

定期.definition: at set dates; at regular intervals; periodic; limited to a fixed period of time; fixed term

定期存款.definition: fixed deposit; time deposit; certificate of deposit (banking)

定格.definition: to fix; to confine to; freeze frame; stop motion (filmmaking)

定案.definition: to reach a verdict; to conclude a judgment

定標.definition: to calibrate (measure or apparatus); fixed coefficient

定檔.definition: (of a film etc) to be set to be released on a specific date

定海.definition: Dinghai district of Zhoushan city 舟山市[Zhou1 shan1 shi4], Zhejiang; Qing dynasty name of 舟山市

定海區.definition: Dinghai district of Zhoushan city 舟山市[Zhou1 shan1 shi4], Zhejiang

定海神針.definition: another name for 金箍棒[jin1 gu1 bang4]; (fig.) stabilizing force

定盤星.definition: the zero point indicator marked on a steelyard; fixed opinion; solid idea; decisive plan

定神.definition: to compose oneself; to concentrate one's attention

定約.definition: to conclude a treaty; to make an agreement; contract (at bridge)

定級.definition: to grade; to rank; to establish the level of sb or sth

定結.definition: Dinggyê county, Tibetan: Gding skyes rdzong, in Shigatse prefecture, Tibet

定結縣.definition: Dinggyê county, Tibetan: Gding skyes rdzong, in Shigatse prefecture, Tibet

定能.definition: to be definitely able (to do sth)

定興.definition: Dingxing county in Baoding 保定[Bao3 ding4], Hebei

定興縣.definition: Dingxing county in Baoding 保定[Bao3 ding4], Hebei

定製.definition: custom-made; made-to-order; to have sth custom made

定襄.definition: Dingxiang county in Xinzhou 忻州[Xin1 zhou1], Shanxi

定襄縣.definition: Dingxiang county in Xinzhou 忻州[Xin1 zhou1], Shanxi

定西市.definition: Dingxi, prefecture-level city in Gansu Province 甘肅省|甘肃省[Gan1su4 Sheng3]

定規.definition: to decide; to determine; established practice; (dialect) firmly resolved (to do sth)

定說.definition: to assert categorically; generally accepted view

定讞.definition: to judge a case; to render a verdict; verdict

定貨.definition: variant of 訂貨|订货[ding4 huo4]

定購.definition: to order goods; to place an order

定遠.definition: Dingyuan, a county in Chuzhou 滁州[Chu2zhou1], Anhui

定遠營.definition: old name of Bayanhot 巴彥浩特|巴彦浩特[Ba1 yan4 Hao4 te4] in Inner Mongolia

定遠縣.definition: Dingyuan, a county in Chuzhou 滁州[Chu2zhou1], Anhui

定邊.definition: Dingbian County in Yulin 榆林[Yu2 lin2], Shaanxi

定邊縣.definition: Dingbian County in Yulin 榆林[Yu2 lin2], Shaanxi

定錢.definition: security deposit; earnest money (real estate); good-faith deposit

定閱.definition: variant of 訂閱|订阅[ding4 yue4]

定音.definition: to call the tune; to make the final decision

定食.definition: set meal (esp. in a Japanese restaurant)

定點.definition: to determine a location; designated; appointed; specific; fixed (time); fixed point (geometry); fixed-point (number)

定點廠.definition: factory designated by the state to make a particular product

定點茶.definition: (Tw) (euphemism) prostitute service at a massage parlor or other place designated by the service provider

定鼎.definition: lit. to set up the sacred tripods (following Yu the Great); to fix the capital; to found a dynasty; used in advertising
